title: 半死不活
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:monotypical]]

[[=]]

嘿嘿，又是我[[footnote]] **译注：**[[*user NebulousStar]] [[/footnote]]。这是我为 [[*user Cole 13]] 所做的交换艺作！我画了罐装版 [[[SCP-6170]]]！
[[/=]]
author: Etinjat
